subject_information.address: 49331 Lewis Views Apt. 516, Lake Maryshire, DE 59549

suspicious_activity.narrative: Customer CUST_0111, Jacqueline Rodriguez, conducted a high volume of transactions totaling $386,834.91 with no outflows, including a substantial $76,517.25 incoming wire transfer on 2025-07-29. Activity raises suspicion of potential money laundering through layering and structuring, as per Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Regulations. Financial institution flagged the suspicious activity for further review and SAR drafting.
key_indicators: High transaction volume with no outflows
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning:
